text: Nick Sacrinty (June 10, 1924 – April 16, 2008) was an American football quarterback. He played for the Chicago Bears in 1947. He died on April 16, 2008, in Eden, North Carolina, at age 83. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2008 deaths Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Wake Forest Demon Deacons football players Category:Chicago Bears players
title: Nick Sacrinty
